message.content:
Step 1: Identify the relevant line items.

• For the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount: that is given in the "Depreciation" line with an amount of 45749.30.

• For the reduction in the amount of assets held for sale (or in production for sale): that is represented by the "(Increase) Decrease in Inventory" line with an amount of -720000.00.

• For the net amount of cash and cash equivalents generated from the acquisition/disposal of long-term assets and other investments: that is the "Net Cash Flow from Investing Activities" line with an amount of -106218.20.

• For the net addition in the amount of cash and cash equivalents during the period: that is given by the "Net Increase" line with an amount of -330351.42.

Step 2: Format the answer in the required JSON output.

{
  "solution": {
    "value1": "45749.30",
    "value2": "-720000.00",
    "value3": "-106218.20",
    "value4": "-330351.42"
  }
}
